Starscream

Starscream heard the conversation that Dark Lavacon was having with 
Zardus, and got an idea. He flew up to Zardus.

"Sir, I have an idea. If these bots truly mean what they say, let me 
test their loyalty by letting me take them back to KitKat and help 
defeat Megatron. It would benefit all, except Megatron of course."
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron arrived at the probe. It marvelled at the complexity.

"Come on Wheeljack, ;et's get this thing back to base!"
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois grew impatient with these bots.

"Are you coming into the base or not? I can not wait forever!"
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Blaze had completed the new head. It's wires were all made new, and 
it had Striker's face, so that when the Maximals look at it they will 
know that their once great comrad was the one killing them. She re-
attached the head, and was going to get Prebon when Hammer, Bullet 
and Ignatius ran in.

"We did it! We have completed our new weapon suit, the BH2. Complete 
with rocket launchers, plasma cannons, infa-red goggles and two 
swords. It's great!"

"Good, because our new mercenairy is finished. He will find great use 
for that. PREBON!!!!"

Prebon entered the room, with a big smile on his face.

"Are we ready? Is he finished?"

"Yes, and his war suit is done as well." Blaze lifted the body and 
popped off the face plate. She flipped a switch, bringing him out of 
stasis lock, and put the plate back on.

"Everyone...I give you our ex-maximal turned cold-blooded killer. 
Meet....Slayer!"

(Take it from here, Yanshosh.)
